member.name: T:Windows.Media.Devices.CallControl
member.summary: Represents the properties, commands and events for handling calls on a telephony related device.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Devices.CallControl.HasRinger
member.summary: Indicates whether the telephony device has a built-in ringer.
member.returns: A [Boolean](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/system.boolean.aspx) value that is **True** if the telephony device has a ringer, and **False** if it does not.

member.name: E:Windows.Media.Devices.CallControl.AnswerRequested
member.summary: Occurs when the device receives a request to answer a call.

member.name: E:Windows.Media.Devices.CallControl.AudioTransferRequested
member.summary: Occurs when the device receives a request for an audio transfer.

member.name: E:Windows.Media.Devices.CallControl.DialRequested
member.summary: Occurs when a number is dialed from the device.

member.name: E:Windows.Media.Devices.CallControl.HangUpRequested
member.summary: Occurs when the device receives a request to hang up a call.

member.name: E:Windows.Media.Devices.CallControl.KeypadPressed
member.summary: Occurs when a keypad button on the device has been pressed.

member.name: E:Windows.Media.Devices.CallControl.RedialRequested
member.summary: Occurs when the device receives a request to redial.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.Devices.CallControl.EndCall(System.UInt64)
member.param: The unique identifier of the specified call.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.Devices.CallControl.FromId(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a Windows.Media.Devices.CallControl class that represents the audio communications device specified by the Windows.Devices.Enumeration.DeviceInformation.Id being passed.
member.param: The Windows.Devices.Enumeration.DeviceInformation.Id of the specified audio communications device.
member.returns: A class that represents the specified audio communications device.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.Devices.CallControl.GetDefault
member.summary: Returns a Windows.Media.Devices.CallControl class that represents the default audio communications device.
member.returns: A class that represents the default audio communications device.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.Devices.CallControl.IndicateActiveCall(System.UInt64)
member.summary: Indicates that the specified call is now active.
member.param: The unique identifier of the specified call.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.Devices.CallControl.IndicateNewIncomingCall(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Informs the device that there is an incoming call.
member.param: Specifies whether the device should activate its built-in ringer.
A numeric string that specifies the incoming caller ID. This parameter can be null, and often is for many VoIP calls.
member.returns: A call token that uniquely identifies this call.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.Devices.CallControl.IndicateNewOutgoingCall
member.summary: Updates device indicators to indicate an outgoing call.
member.returns: A call token that uniquely identifies this call.

member.name: T:Windows.Media.Devices.CallControlEventHandler
member.param: The Windows.Media.Devices.CallControl object that raised the event.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Devices.DialRequestedEventArgs.Contact
member.summary: Returns the contact that was dialed.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.Devices.DialRequestedEventArgs.Handled
member.summary: Indicates that the Windows.Media.Devices.CallControl.DialRequested event has been handled.

member.name: T:Windows.Media.Devices.DialRequestedEventHandler
member.param: The Windows.Media.Devices.CallControl object that raised the event.
A class containing information for the event.

member.name: P:Windows.Media.Devices.KeypadPressedEventArgs.TelephonyKey
member.summary: Returns the value of the keypad button on the device that was pressed.
member.returns: The key. One of the values of the Windows.Media.Devices.TelephonyKey enumeration.

member.name: T:Windows.Media.Devices.KeypadPressedEventHandler
member.param: The Windows.Media.Devices.CallControl object that raised the event.
A class containing information for the event.

member.name: M:Windows.Media.Devices.RedialRequestedEventArgs.Handled
member.summary: Indicates that the Windows.Media.Devices.CallControl.RedialRequested event has been handled.

member.name: T:Windows.Media.Devices.RedialRequestedEventHandler
member.param: The Windows.Media.Devices.CallControl object that raised the event.
A class containing information for the event.

member.name: T:Windows.Media.Devices.TelephonyKey
member.summary: Indicates the keypad button that was pressed on a telephony device.
